++ Star Chamber

The Camera Stellara, or Star Chamber, consisted of a number of the Queen's councillors, who enforced her will on recalcitrant nobles.

In 1583, they included:
Lord Chancellor:Sir Thomas Bromley (1579–1587)
Lord treasurer:William Cecil, 1st Baron Burghley (July 1572 – 4 August 1598)
Lord of the Privy Seal:Francis Walsingham (1576–1590)
Lord Chamberlain:Thomas Radclyffe, 3rd Earl of Sussex (c. 1525 – 9 June 1583)
